title: Resources
text:
My favourite talks

David Deutsch: Chemical scum that dream of distant quasars. 
Ken Dill: The protein folding problem: A major conundrum of science. 
Lisa Feldman Barrett: You aren’t at mercy of your emotions – you create them. 
Mariana Mazzucato: Government – investor, risk-taker, innovator. 
Kay M. Tye: What investigating neural pathway can reveal about mental health

title: About Me
text:
I earned my bachelor in Industrial & Systems engineer at Universidad de Piura in Peru, I hold a MBA from Universidad Los Andes in Colombia. I am a Neuroscience PhD candidate at the Univeristy of Tsukuba in Japan. Previously, tech entrepreneur. I am currently living in Tsukuba, Japan’s renowned science city, where I am actively developing my next business idea.
Currently, I am working on a project aimed at advancing the collection of emotional brain wave data during sleep, with the goal of improving our understanding of how emotions influence behavior. This work could lead to the development of brain-computer interfaces that enhance our ability to diagnose and treat brain disorders, such as depression and anxiety. This would be possible by enabling more precise monitoring and intervention based on emotional brain activity.
Previously, I founded PickApp (now Scharff Express), which later became a leading provider of software solutions for the transportation industry. PickApp was acquired by Scharff Inc. (FedEx Representative - Peru) in December 2017, hitting a milestone within the startup ecosystem in Peru. You can see the news here..This project was part of the 2nd generation of StartUp Peru and Ynnovadores.
Throughout my career, I have developed deep understanding of the entire value chain from concept to launch, business development, strategic innovation and key partnerships.
I have managed and executed over 100 improvement projects across Mexico, Colombia, Peru, and Spain, many of which continue to deliver value today. I am passionate about helping businesses and entrepreneurs develop and implement digital strategies, leveraging design thinking and lean startup methodologies

title: Felix Ipanaque Arevalo
text:
Welcome! My name is Felix. I am a Ph.D. student with a research focus on understanding the neural mechanisms underlying emotions in dreams.
Through my research, I aspire to develop insights and interventions that can help individuals enhance the quality of their sleep and unlock the full potential of their cognitive abilities.
As a former tech entrepreneur who transitioned into a scientist to gain new ideas and knowledge, I’ve always been fascinated by the intersection of technology and human behavior.
Currently, I am using a brain computer interface approach to help people improve their sleep.
I collaborate with Dr. Abe Takashi in the Human Sleep Lab at the International Institute for Integrative Sleep Medicine (IIIS), University of Tsukuba in Ibaraki, Japan.
  My CV is available here.

title: Events & Talks
text:
Appropiate Technology - Japan 2019
Presentation on “How to kick-off your ideas?”
Appropiate Technology is conducted at The University of Tsukuba (Japan) under the School of Integrative and Global Majors.

title: Events & Talks
text:
Appropiate Technology Demo Day - Japan 2018
Advisor, speaker and judge for the Demo Day of Appropiate Technology course. This course aims to give its students a holistic experience for developing a simple and low-cost technology for their target community. Appropiate Technology is conducted at The University of Tsukuba (Japan) under the School of Integrative and Global Majors.

title: Events & Talks
section: Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Forum. Port Moresby - 2018
text:
Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Forum. Port Moresby - 2018
I was invited to give a talk on the risks and opportunities of using big data in a digital economy.
APEC is a regional economic forum to promote foreign trade across Asia-Pacific country members.

title: Events & Talks
text:
StartUp Peru Summit 2017
I was invited to share my experiences on the Merge & Acquisition of PickApp by Scharff Inc.PickApp by Scharff Inc.
SUP Summit is the largest annual meeting of the peruvian startup ecosystem. SUP Summit 2017 aimed to foster collaborative work and open innovation among different stakeholders of the peruvian entrepreneurial ecosystem.

title: Events & Talks
text:
Intercon 2016
The International Conference on Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computing – INTERCON aims to bring together researchers, professionals, students and entrepreneurs to facilitate the approach, identification and commitment to join challenges that allow the development of technologies for the benefit of humanity. This event is organized by the IEEE Peru Section.
I was invited as a speaker to talk about my experience as a founder of PickApp, one of the very first startups in Peru.

title: Events & Talks
text:
Pacific Alliance - Mexico 2015
The Pacific Alliance is an initiative of regional integration across Chile, Colombia, Mexico and Peru. The trip was an initiative of the Peruvian startup community to find investors in Mexico.
